string-array.name: fortunes
string-array.item: I would bet both halves of my arse on it.
Does the pope shit in the woods?
Yes. Can I go home now?
Why don\'t you go ask your mum?
How the hell am I meant to know?
Shake again\, but don\'t mumble this time.
STOP SHAKING ME SO BLOODY HARD.
ERROR CODE 5378 \: WITTY RESPONSE NOT FOUND
You don\'t deserve to have that happen.
I wouldn\'t bet even if it was free.
Normally, Yes, but for you? Nope.
